function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on construction industry","Impact":"Disruption of construction projects, economic impacts, and increased health risks","Mitigation":"Implementing stricter health and safety protocols, adapting project timelines and budgets, and addressing economic challenges","Technologies":"Health monitoring technology, contact tracing systems, and virtual collaboration tools","People":"Construction professionals, managers, engineers, suppliers","Owner":"Construction companies, government agencies"},{"Description":"Risks and adverse effects of COVID-19 on tunnel construction sites","Impact":"Delays in construction, increased health risks for workers, and potential project cost overruns","Mitigation":"Enhancing health and safety measures, re-evaluating project timelines, and cost management strategies","Technologies":"Health monitoring technology, remote monitoring systems, and project management software","People":"Construction workers, project managers, stakeholders","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers"},{"Description":"Impact of pandemic on construction professionals' performance","Impact":"Decreased productivity, mental and physical health challenges, and job satisfaction concerns","Mitigation":"Providing mental health support, flexible work arrangements, and training on remote work tools","Technologies":"Mental health apps, virtual communication platforms, and remote collaboration software","People":"Construction professionals, managers, supervisors","Owner":"Construction companies, human resource departments"}]}
